page.title: 20ST.AUGUSTINE'S GOLF COURSE
page.content: Is an 18 hole golf course near Cliffsend,it is in a pleasant setting on the south side of Cliffsend over looking Pegwell Bay,it is used every day of the year and has approx. 600 members .The membership ages range from the youngest member who is 10 to the oldest member who is 83 yrs old. Trophies are presented annually by local organisations inc the R.A.F.{ {The grounds are tended by 4 staff. {There is a club secretary {There is a professonal golfer and a {specialist golf shop. {Fees: } Gentlemens Â£140.30p inc VAT ann. fee Green fees Â£ 8.00 week days Â£ 10.00 weekends/Bank Hols. {Private bar and club for members only In comparison with other golf clubs in the district St Augustine's is considered a small course.
